page.title: 20 SCIENCE/TECHNOLOGY _KINNEFF
page.content: In school we have two{computers.}The pupils use them to play educational games and experiment with basic programming. There is a computer at Slains Park farm. It is used to record animal food rations, milk yields and weight gain. All farm accounts are fed into the computer. All the latest {agricultural machinery}is used too, such as automatic grain driers, turbo_charged tractors with electronic lift controls and combine_harvesters with a rotary threshing concept. The crops are sprayed with special chemicals to eliminate weeds and fungus and prevent damage. Often helicopters are used to do spraying. In 1984 a M.o.D. station was built in our area. It is an early warning{radar {station}connected to 26 others and is used to pin_point movement of anything in British waters.
